job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtThe ideal candidates favorite words are learning data scale and agility You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answersampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtAnalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processingltligtltligtDesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithmsltligtltligtCollaborate with engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to productionltligtltligtGenerate actionable insights for business improvementsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree or equivalent experience in quantitative field Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Engineering etcltligtltligtAt least 1  2 years of experience in quantitative analytics or data modelingltligtltligtDeep understanding of predictive modeling machinelearning data normalizationdata cleaning clustering and classification techniques and algorithmsltligtltligtFluency in a programming language Python CC Java SQLltligtltligtFamiliarity with Big Data frameworks and visualization tools Cassandra Hadoop Spark Tableaultligtltulgt
